籤詩版本二:
Asikho isidingo sokukhathazeka ngokugula kwamanje kanye namacala. Umhlaba oyigugu kanye nengcebo konke kuyatholakala.
Njengoba nje inkawu manje ikhululeka emaketangeni futhi ibuyela emhumeni ukuze izule
詩意:
Le hexagram imele umfanekiso wenkawu ekhululwa emaketangeni ayo.
Konke kunzima ngaphambi kokuba kube lula kamuva.
解曰: Lahla izinto. Futhi khululeka. Woza ngesikhathi esifanele. Thola indlela efanele.
籤詩故事一:
◇Xiangzi uhlangana nesivakashi (u-Han Xiangzi uhlangana no-Lu Dongbin)
Ebukhosini baseTang, uHan Xiangzi wayengumzukulu kaHan Yu. Unemvelo engcolile futhi akakwazi ukufunda, ngakho akukho okunye angakwenza ngaphandle kokuphuza. Wabizwa uHan Yu ukuba azofunda kulesi sikole, kodwa esikhundleni sokufunda kahle, wahlukumeza afunda nabo. Kamuva, uHan Yu wahlela ukuba ayofunda esigodlweni sezindela, kodwa umphathi wendlu yezindela wakhononda ngokuthi wayezidla.
Kamuva, uLu Dongbin weza ezomkhanyisela, futhi ekugcineni waba umuntu ongafi. Iqanjwe ngo-Emperor Yaohua. Omunye Wabayisishiyagalombili Abangafi. Uphawu lwayo ubhasikidi wezimbali ophethwe ngesandla.
聖意: Angikhululekile ekhaya, ngithandazela ingcebo nenhlanhla, ukuthengiselana kulindile, umshado awukaqedwa, uLiujia uthandazela abahamba ngezinyawo baye emasimini, izikelemu ziningi, Liu izilwane ezifuywayo zitholakala, abantu batholakala , icala lilungile, impahla elahlekile ikude, isifo sineshwa, ithuna lihle.
古人: U-Xiangzi uhlangana nesivakashi (u-Han Xiangzi uhlangana no-Lu Dongbin)
